titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4908) to authorize the hydrogen and fusion research, development, and demonstration programs, and the high energy physics and nuclear physics programs, of the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-695, by Mr. Gordon.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4908 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 211.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 8/10/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4908 (the hydrogen and fusion research, development, and demonstration programs and the high energy physics and nuclear physics programs).
